name: Aeon Nightmares
description:
• Adorable cast of characters
  • Multiple boss fights, items and environments to explore
  • Bunch of optional content and random chance encounters
  • Never ending nightmares

I have worked on this solo for over 2 years now.

Sound effects are from freesound.org and the music is made by Catonator and Felis.

Be sure to check out Catonator at https://soundcloud.com/catonator-1

and Felis at https://soundcloud.com/felis-catus-1
